getinsured.pagetitle: We need to share something with you about your health insurance options.
getinsured.pagemessage:
Did you know that you do have options when selecting health insurance? And did you know that you may qualify for tax credits for your insurance?

Open Enrollment is Nov. 15th - Feb. 15th and is the time for you to take action. Click below to learn about your options & any financial assistance you may be eligible for.

You can’t be denied coverage for health reasons, and all plans cover prescription drugs, doctor or hospital visits & more.

Health insurance can be confusing, but GetInsured makes it easy:
getinsured.message1: Affordability:  It’s less expensive than you may think.
getinsured.message2: Peace-of-mind:  Enrolling may help minimize future healthcare costs for you & any family members.
getinsured.message3: Options:  You select the plan, the provider & the amount of coverage.

audaxrally.pagetitle: You're done with enrollment. Now it's time to Rally!
audaxrally.pagemessage: Rally, our health engagement partner, empowers you to create lasting, positive habits you can stick to by making small simple changes - one step at a time.  Sign up for free to receive your personalized plan tailored to you.
audaxrally.message1: Fill out our fast and fun health survey, and right away you'll get custom-made missions to help recharge your life.
audaxrally.message2: Create and track personal health goals to keep you on the path to a healthier you.
audaxrally.message3: Earn Rally Coins and win great prizes for making healthier choices, tracking your progress, and completing your missions.
